Dialog.text: Space is cold. Business is cold. He signed up for this. He's a hacker.
It's not like he picked a safe job, right? So he's probably lived twice as long working for us as he would have otherwise.
That's right. And thanks to module thirteen, they're going to be fine. Which is what he would - what he wanted all along.
Come on now; you think deep down, he doesn't already know?
Right, so - you're good? You can handle this?
Brilliant. I knew you were the right handler. Let me grab you something to eat. Turkey, double provolone?
I'm the O.C. at KASMA Corp overseeing your unit. Basilisk reports to me.
You've done brilliant work for us. Thank you.
Unfortunately, budgets are tight and we just can't afford to pick you up.
We're going to honor the contract though and send your completion bonus to your family.
